评论详情: The first pair came in a new box as the first because the first box was badly damaged.  The shoes looked smashed.  After contacting the company through Amazon, they immediately sent me a new pair with the understanding that they won't charge me for the 2nd pair as long as I get the first ones returned to them by the deadline they gave me which was a nice deadline, instead of a very short window of time.  The second pair came in a tight plastic sack on the shoes and an outer plastic mailing pkg. They looked smashed also.  I showed them both to my son in law for his birthday for him to choose if either pair was acceptable for him to wear.  He said these kind of minimalist shoes were supposed to be this way to conform easy with your feet so I gave him both and he was happy!  He has worn these same type of shoes for several years and will probably want these same ones next year too.  SO, the SHOES WERE GREAT, EVEN FOR HIS SERIOUS FEET ISSUES!  PLUS the company's CUSTOMER SERVICE was immediate and EXCELLENT to work with!  Since I can't find a way to go ahead and pay them now for the 2nd pair of shoes instead of waiting until I am past due in paying for them since I am keeping both pairs, I am hoping AMAZON/THE WHITEN COMPANY will see this and go ahead and charge me now (& let me know they did) since we are definitely keeping both pairs!!  Thank you so much for your wonderful and kind help!

I am a Doctor of Chiropractic, so I'm very particular with how my shoes compliment the biomechanics of the human foot.  The only casual shoes that I wear now are Whitin.  I can wear these shoes comfortably with or without socks.  They look super cool, and they are very affordable.  I have found that they hold up well.  I bought this model, plus another model.  I have had them for at least 6 months and I am very satisfied.What I love about Whitin shoes are the fact that they are built to allow the human foot to simply do what it was designed to do.  This is accomplished in these shoes by having no incline in the heel (zero drop) so the posterior chain of your leg (calf and hamstrings) are not flexed and shortened, and by having a wide toe box so that your toes can spread out as far as they need to.  A zero drop and a wide toe box allow for the proper motion of the 26 bones within the foot.  When the foot moves properly, it absorbs shock.  If the foot doesn't move properly, such as when you are wearing bad shoes (please note:  99% of shoes are made with an incline in the heel and a narrow toe box, and are therefore classified as bad in this doctors opinion), shock will not get absorbed by the foot as well and will get absorbed by your knees, hips, and spine, especially the low back.  Whitin shoes are also great because they are minimalist and have a thin sole.  This allows for greater proprioception between the brain and the feet (proprioception is the brains ability to sense where body parts are in space).  In essence, when you buy shoes, you want them to mimic walking barefoot.  Whitin allows for your feet to do this.  I recommend these shoes to patients on a weekly basis.If you are a human and you have feet, find yourself some high-quality zero drop, wide toe box shoes like Whitins!

The canvas and soft leather bond very well. Very durable. These are very comfortable, roomy, flexible barefoot shoes. They have a deliberately thin sole and minimal padding.  They have good traction on wet concrete and in the mud.

评论概述: Nice casual dress shoe in black
评论详情: I bought a pair of Whitin running shoes 6 months ago, and I love them, so a bit of reviewer bias here.  I wanted a pair of casual dress shoes and my old ones are pure torture, so I decided to give these a try.  They look great (after removing the white Whitin tag), and are comfortable with a minimalist feel.  Great for walking and keep my feet from getting too warm.  I wouldn't want to wear them for sports, not as much cushion or support as the running shoe.

评论概述: Very comfortable & wide toe box shoe!
评论详情: I have had a pair of the white Whitin’s with the natural sole for several months... Wide toe box is good very comfortable. White tops get dirty easily but I have not done scotch guard or other similar product to see if that helps. Added $2 inserts for added comfort. Like this product good enough so I would order again. Would suggest ordering with toe socks for max comfort. Overall very comfortable with light inserts.  Very flexible toe, breathable canvas keeps feet comfy, kind of slippery on the soles so light use indoors or light outdoor use. Comfortable for basic weight room exercise…heavy aerobic training, long distance running workout? Style is ok, white sole probably a little nicer appearance for folks who like a one color show.

Did my research about a cost effective type of barefoot shoe to use when lifting. Very glad I did my research because it led me to this shoe. I have done a lot dynamic lifting with it over the months and haven't notice very much wear and tear. Planning on getting more of these even for casual use in the future!

评论概述: Best shoes ever for saver tailor bunions
评论详情: I got these shoes back a few years ago when my feet first started getting bad and I could no longer wear normal shoes even the widest shoes hurt, these shoes were a godsend. It is now 2024 about 2 years later and hubby just bought me my second pair. I will hopefully get surgery soon but till then these shoes are the only way I'm able to make it threw my 10 hour days at work. Best find ever and I will definitely get more in different colors. If you have bad feet like mine grab a pair and give them a try, I was dieing after 3 hours on my feet before these shoes.

Fits a little big but I don’t mind some extra space. Affordable barefoot/minimalist alternative to converse/vans or whatever style shoes. Thinner flexible sole feels good to walk on and plenty of room for the toes. Can’t say much on durability yet but for the price I wouldn’t be too upset if they don’t last a year of heavy use.

评论概述: One the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned
评论详情: These are great for walking around, running on an elliptical trainer, or just wearing around the house. They are very light weight, and the wide toe box is extraordinarily comfortable for someone like me who has extra wide feet. The cloth uppers means that they aren't great outdoor shoes in the winter months, but for the rest of the year I can't think of anything more comfortable outside of slippers.
I took a gamble on this shoe. It was extremely uncomfortable. The body and sole were virtually unpadded. I returned them very quickly.

Every barefoot shoe has a degree of comfort and discomfort. And there is no one size fits all. But my husband has found that these are so far very good for him. They are the first pair of barefoot shoes he has owned, but he is definitely happy with them. Of course, as with any barefoot shoes, he wishes they had a little more comfort to them, as his feet feel kind of exposed. But that’s the style barefoot shoe. He wears them pretty much every time he’s not at work, and they have lasted several months now and other than looking a little dirty from walking in mud and stuff, they look and feel just the same as when he got them.
Extremely comfortable. Quite durable. No issues after many wears.
Fits great but could use better padding for us bigger guys

评论概述: Good shoe, good fit, simple, and affordable!

类型: Size: 11 WideColor: W872 | Black Gum (Knit Upper)
评论详情: Good shoe if you're looking to get into zero drop, foot shaped shoes without breaking the bank. A lot of foot shaped zero drop shoes are $100+. If you're just getting into these types of shoes, that's a lot to invest in something you might not end up using. Shoe has good traction, nice heel cushion, and looks like a regular shoe at first glance.  One issue I have in particular is the lacing system could be improved. I have my laces tightened all the way to the point it can't tighten anymore, but it's still pretty loose, I can slip them on and off without having to retie them, that's how loose they are.  Other than that, it's a good daily walking shoe.

Overall these are solid shoes for the price point. They really do put your feet a bit closer to the ground and your toes have a lot of breathing room which is a welcome change from your typical shoe. The lack of arch support and low cushion could cause issues if you have foot pain, it took me a few weeks to really adjust.  Another thing is the durability, I'm not sure how good the soles actually are. I'm about 240lbs so I tend to wear my shoes down quickly and these are no different. So I'd say they have average durability. I've had 1 pair for 2 months and I can already see some wear in the rubber sole at the mid foot and heel. I bought a second pair since I like them so much. Another thing to note is the heel area feels somewhat narrow when you first put them on, but they quickly compress and feel very comfortable. The only reason I give them 4 instead of 5 is the durability. I am still searching for a shoe that has a very durible heel. I'd like to buy shoes that last 2 or 3 years instead of 1 or less than 1.

评论用户: Excellent! Have paid hundreds more for JBL'S with comparable sound quality!
评论详情: Well made very light.

I love the vibrant blue color. These worked for me once I put my own superfeet insole inside--otherwise they have almost no support. I have wide feet and these worked well with my high instep and width. I'm not sure how they'll hold up, but they are comfortable for now.

I treat them kinda like casual/boat shoes, they’re very comfy without socks and go well with shorts during the summer.  The laces on mine were oddly textured, they could’ve gone with a plainer white lace.  Took a star off for the squeaky soles, wish I could take off 1.5 stars. Not quite bad enough to rate it a 3 but everywhere I go sounds like a basketball court at the local Y.

Even a slight rise in the heel is apt to throw me off balance, so I decided to try "barefoot" shoes with zero rise. The only problem is that I ordered a pricey pair before ordering Whitin's. Could have  at least two pairs of these for less than the big brand cost, and I like the Whitin's better!

If you were looking for the pillow for your feet, then look no further. This shoe is IT. I'm a personal trainer and I'm BIG on foot function as it is the root to our movement. I recommend wide toe box shoes and zero drop arches to all my clients, but most of the big companies are 140$+ for one pair. Somehow I stumbled upon these shoes and WOW. It passes the test! They're what dreams are made of. The zero drop Insert is like a pillow for your feet. Then it passes the wide toe box test! And they're so light. All of this for 35$ (prime day deal)!?!?!?! That's INSANE. I feel like I'm stealing it from the company. I can't remember the last shoe I bought for under $100 that I liked... if you wanna treat your body right AND your wallet right. BUY A PAIR!

I have neuropathy in my feet and ankles complete numbness and a lot of pain. It’s non-diabetic neuropathy. These shoes are the second pair I bought and I feel that they make my feet work. I don’t slip in these shoes my feet have flexibility in them so they’re moving. They’re working like they’re supposed to be. Love the effects of these shoes are having on me and my body.

I usually wear a wide mens size 9. These have a very wide toe box, so I ended up with a mens 8.5.  I love these minimalist shoes! I often wear flair pants at work, and these shoes almost disappear under my pants. They are very comfortable, especially if you are doing a lot of light walking and sitting. These are not high support shoes, so you may opt for more support if you are doing several miles of walking. I also love that these shoes breath, so they work well in warmer weather. I am a traveling salesperson, so I do spend a lot of time sitting in cars with short spurts of running into stores. These work wonders, and they look professional under my pants. Will def buy again when these wear out.  *Note, these are a relatively inexpensive shoe. I dont expect these to last several years. That being said, I think you absolutely get your moneys worth.

Great on the ground. Too wide to drive my manual

This is my 7th pair of Whithins. I previously spent $100+ for wide toe box shoes and in general feel like Whitin is good value for the money, although only time will tell about durability. In the year that I've been buying them (5 different colors) I've seen variation in the number of lace eyelets. These ones have 4 which is an improvement from 5 and 6 found on other Whithins I've bought. Unfortunately, they just spread them out further rather than moving them further back; no one with wide feet needs eyelets compressing the widest part of the foot.  If anyone from Within reads this, please consider moving the eyelets back towards the heel a little. My only complaint about this pair is the complete lack of heel cushioning. My other Withins all have a comfortable heel cushion. Was this a cost savings thing? I just don't get it. I don't write many reviews, but this is a product I want to keep buy so hopefully the Withinlings will read this and stop cutting corners. Keep making a quality product and I will keep buying it and recommending it.

评论概述: Not terrible, but not worth it.

评论概述: Great replacement for Converse or the like!

So I bought these in 2022 (it's 2024 now) and they are still my favorite shoes. I have sense bought a second pair to keep for occasions where I want something that looks clean and not used every day for everything. 2 years after purchase and heavy abuse there is still little to no damage, just dirt, stains, and signs of love. I hike, mow, shop, drive, and just about everything else you can think of while wearing these. All seems have held up, upper hasn't rubbed through, soul is still in good condition. I love these. Oh and did I mention I've stepped on glass and nails with these, you can feel a prick but nothing has ever punctured through. Be aware these are barefoot shoes, if you're not used to that type of shoes it will be a big transition for you. Super light shoe, zero drop, very flexible, has releaved a lot of foot pain, wide and over all amazing.

评论详情: I love the durability of this model and its so comfortable, but the black color fades rapidly.

I had a ton of doubt about these thinking they’d be cheap crappy shoes or that they’d look dorky, but they actually were pretty durable, had a wide toe box, and looked identical to vans when I threw them on! Highly highly recommend!  Vans narrow toe box destroyed my feet, ditch them and get these.
These are definitely wide box, no thrills shoes. For $30+ I didn’t expect much but I definitely enjoy them so far. I need to get some insoles for them
I got size 11 (usually i’m 10.5) and it fit well but there’s this super ugly dent-like crease towards the tip of the shoe.  Also, the shoe is overall uglier imo than in the pictures.
Good fit, comfortable. And after about a year they're still in good condition.

I wasn't too sure about this whole barefoot movement but it works! I feel like my feet have gotten significantly stronger in only a few week, and you really do feel your feet working a little extra during leg days at the gym. Best reason to buy these over any other barefoot shoes: These are not too ugly! All barefoot shoes are very ugly but you can barely notice these are barefoot shoes, and I'll take that as a win

Comfortable and stylish. I have been wearing them almost daily for a few weeks now and they've been holding up great. I had been looking for an affordable barefoot shoe and this fits the bill. The sizing chart was accurate, I usually am 9 - 9.5 women’s shoe size and size 7.5 - 8 (41) fit perfectly. The only thing I didn’t like was the tag placement because I think it makes it look a bit cheap, so I ended up cutting it off. I also used a waterproofing shoe spray on them to hopefully help extend their lifetime and allow me to use them during the wetter seasons.

I’m trying to go with the “barefoot” lifestyle, as I’m currently doing “carnivore diet”. I have lost about 50lbs and would really like to give barefoot a go. Unfortunately the size that I ordered was too big for my taste. I’ll order a size down. In the meantime I’ll continue to use my 2pcs of vibram fivefingers.
